name: elpwgdedVD
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: el12(w0, w1, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wvd1(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wvd1(w1, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wvd1(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wvd1(w1, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))

stmt.origin: biimpar(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
stmt.pretty: biimpar(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆ c1, c0 ∈ P(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wvd1(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wvd1(w1, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wvd1(wvhc2(w0, w1), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wvd1(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wvd1(w1, wss(c0, c1))

comment: Membership in a power class. Theorem 86 of [Suppes] p. 47. Derived from ~ elpwg . In form of VD deduction with ` ph ` and ` ps ` as variable virtual hypothesis collections based on Mario Carneiro's metavariable concept. ~ elpwgded is ~ elpwgdedVD using conventional notation. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 23-Apr-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
